headline: Ford, GM Use Leasing ‘Loophole’ to Extend $7,500 EV Tax Credit
summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) is one of the best stocks to buy under $20. On September 30, Ford and General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) initiated programs with their car dealers to effectively extend the benefit of the expiring $7,500 US federal tax credit on leases of EVs. This move comes just before the subsidy’s expiration date, […]

headline: Former Tesla exec claims EV industry will grow, not shrink, after death of $7,500 tax credit: ‘The market’s established’
summary: But Ford CEO Jim Farley sees EV sales being cut in half after the expiry of the $7,500 federal tax credit.
